class.name: DevenvBuildStep
class.description: A [Visual Studio IDE step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run Visual Studio IDE command

function.name: dotnetDevenv
function.description: Adds a [Visual Studio IDE step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run Visual Studio IDE command @see DevenvBuildStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to projects and solutions. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: vs.version
param.description: Visual Studio version to use @see VSVersion

param.name: vs.action
param.description: Visual Studio IDE command to execute @see VSAction

param.name: configuration
param.description: Specifies the project configuration to build or deploy.

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for .NET MSBuild.

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.

option.name: Clean
option.description: Deletes any files created by the build command, without affecting source files

option.name: Rebuild
option.description: Cleans and then builds the specified solution or project according to the configuration of the specified solution

option.name: Build
option.description: Builds the specified solution or project according to the configuration of the specified solution

option.name: Deploy
option.description: Builds the solution, along with files necessary for deployment, according to the solution's configuration
